post:
Hi!
We are the ServersGet team and we are pleased to announce the grand opening of our new hosting company! 
We have 10 years of business experience in shared hosting, dedicated servers, VPS and cloud servers.
We offer great deals and discounts, high quality hosting services all around the world!
The servers we sell are located in 40+ countries. Also they come with the bunch of special features like instant setup, IPv6 /48 subnets, many IPv4 addresses per server without an issue, DDoS protection, 1 Gbps Unlimited bandwidth.Powerful and the cheapest servers with free Windows OS and other to your taste!
We have all you need - just follow us on [serversget.com](http://serversget.com) and get the best quality!
NO VAT
NO HIDDEN FEES
just make your order and enjoy ;)
